title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 April 2016 - XWiki
content:
<ujjwal> has quit

09:13 <vmassol> good morning  
09:14 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:22 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:23 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning  
09:28 <vmassol> do you remember if we have a jira issue for the following: when the delete operation fails the user cannot see the reason, he has to do on the FS to locate the associate job status.xml file. We'd need to make that visible in the UI. FTR Ludovic got hit by a delete issue yesterday and couldn't figure out how to find the reason and he had to ask for my help.  
09:29 <mflorea> Hi vmassol  
09:31 <mflorea> I can't find one, and I don't remember creating one  
09:32 <mflorea> wait  
09:32 <mflorea> found  
09:32 <mflorea> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13052  
09:32 <vmassol> haha and I raised it ;)  
09:32 <vmassol> thanks  
09:32 <mflorea> yw  
09:39 <vmassol> BFD day!  
09:39 <vmassol> thanks Alex for sending the mail  
09:40 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
09:41 <acotiuga> Hello!  
09:41 <vmassol> hi  
09:47 <Pbas> Good morning, here my silly question today:  
09:47 <Pbas> In other word: create a new page with MyNewDoc?parent=MyTemplate is equivalent to copy MyTemplate to MyNewDoc? Thxs  
09:48 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <vmassol> Pbas: yes it's equivalent AFAIK  
09:51 <Pbas> ok. cool thxs :)  
09:51 <vmassol> only diff is that when you edit with template  
09:52 <vmassol> then the user is presented with the new page not saved yet  
09:52 <vmassol> so we can make content modificaiton and then save  
09:53 <Pbas> ok my idea was to copy template, make some modif, save and go in edit mode for user ty  
09:53 <vmassol> ok

17:53 <vmassol> sdumitriu: hi  
18:16 <vmassol> tmortagne: cool that you fixed this one :)  
18:16 <vmassol> CopyOnWriteArrayList never used this one!  
18:16 <tmortagne> it was not very common  
18:16 <tmortagne> I never saw this issue actually but it should not happen anymore  
18:16 <tmortagne> first time I use it also  
18:17 <vmassol> btw sorry guys for not participating to BFD, I feel bad about this...  
18:17 <vmassol> but been really busy in various meetings again...  
18:17 <tmortagne> I skipped a few BFD myself some time ago, getting back on track :)  
18:18 <vmassol> :)  
18:44 <mflorea> has quit  
18:45 <fcharton> Hi. I upgraded XWiki from 7.1.2 to 7.1.4 and then to 7.4.2. When on 7.4.2, the LDAP identification is not working for existing users. When trying with a new user, the connection succeeds. Do you have any clue on where to look for issues ?  
18:47 <tmortagne> fcharton: you should enabled debug log and see what you get, see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Authentication#HEnableLDAPdebuglog  
18:48 <fcharton> thanks tmortagne , I'll have a look  
18:52 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:02 <fcharton> Seems to be related to the fact that the mail field has multiple values in LDAP. Causes Illegal casting exception from ArrayList to String.  
19:03 <lkrejci> has quit  
19:03 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
19:09 <sdumitriu> vmassol: Hi  
19:09 <vmassol> Hi sdumitriu, I've pinged you on skype. I'd like to find some time when I could have a quick discussion with you. Do you think that's possible?  
19:10 <sdumitriu> I don't use Skype anymore, so it's better to send me an email to reach me  
19:10 <vmassol> k  
19:10 <vmassol> but for talking to you, what tool should I use? :)  
19:10 <sdumitriu> When would you have time?  
19:11 <sdumitriu> I'm free for the next 40m  
19:11 <vmassol> now for example or any time you're free  
19:11 <sdumitriu> K, let me grab a portable device  
19:11 <sdumitriu> Hangouts OK?  
19:11 <vmassol> yup
